about_the_game:
Alien Bounty is a first-person open-world sci-fi bounty hunting game.
Pursue targets in a dynamic galaxy, locate them in densly populated alien cities and either execute or capture them alive. Earn credits from bounties, and decide to spend it on countless rpg customizations, or upgrade your ship to reach further systems. It’s big universe out there, and only the toughest bounty hunters thrive!

USE YOUR EYES:
At the core lies the bounty system, which randomizes the target’s race, skin color & clothing.
Though you will employ helpful gadgets, ultimately you’ll have to use your eyes, to locate your unique target in the dense alien crowds.



BOUNTY DYNAMIC TRAITS:
To spice things up, each target gets their own unique mix of stats & traits. Some derive from the race, and others are generated on the fly. But both will drastically influence the hunt, be sure to study your mark.

EMERGENT HUNT:
You are free to travel to any planet, customize your character, pick or dismiss bounties, choose which methods to find them with, and use either violent or non-lethal takedown.
In each of the above you will also encounter unforeseen circumstances which will effect those choices, potentially discovering new playstyles.

RPG CUSTOMIZATION:
Customize your bounty hunter to fit your preferred unique playstyle.
From numerous tracking gadgets, mobility gear to a variety of takedown approaches. The possibilities are for you to explore.
